00125 void GameControls::keyReleaseEvent(
00126                                                                     QKeyEvent *_event
00127                                                                  )
00128 {
00129     // once we have processed any key here pass the event
00130     // onto the GLWindow class to do more processing
00131     if((m_gl != NULL) && (m_gl->getGameWonFlag() == false) && (m_gl->getGameLostFlag() == false))
00132     {
00133         m_gl->processKeyUp(_event);
00134     }
00135 
00136 }
00137 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void GameControls::keyPressEvent(
00139                                QKeyEvent *_event
00140                               )
00141 {
00142   // this method is called every time the main window recives a key event.
00143   // we then switch on the key value and set the camera in the GLWindow
00144 
00145 
00146     if ((m_gl != NULL) && (m_gl->getGameWonFlag() == false) && (m_gl->getGameLostFlag() == false))
00147     {
00148         if(m_gl->getSimulationFlag() == 0)
00149         {
00150             switch (_event->key())
00151             {
00152                 case Qt::Key_Escape : QApplication::exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); break;
00153                 case Qt::Key_F : showFullScreen(); break;
00154                 case Qt::Key_N : showNormal(); break;
00155                 case Qt::Key_Up : setPowerBar(10); break;
00156                 case Qt::Key_Down : setPowerBar(-10); break;
00157                 case Qt::Key_Space : setPowerBar(0);  break;
00158                 default : break;
00159         }
00160 
00161 
00162         m_gl->processKeyDown(_event);
00163 
00164         }
00165     }// block all keys if we are in air
00166 
00167 }

00172 void GameControls::startGame()
00173 {
00174 
00175 
00176     m_ui->m_progressBar->setVisible(true);
00177     m_ui->loading->setVisible(true);
00178     m_gameRunning = startTimer(1);
00179     setProgressBar();
00180     constructTheGame();
00181     if ( m_ui->m_beginner->isChecked())
00182     {
00183         m_gl->setDifficulty(BEGINNER);
00184 
00185     }
00186     else if(m_ui->m_advanced->isChecked())
00187     {
00188         m_gl->setDifficulty(ADVANCED);
00189     }
00190     m_gl->setLevel(m_ui->m_levelSetDial->value());
00191     m_ui->s_GameWindowLayout->addWidget(m_gl,0,0,1,8);
00192     m_ui->m_startGame->setDisabled(true);
00193     m_ui->levelSettingsBox->setDisabled(true);
00194     m_ui->textBrowser->clearFocus();
00195     m_ui->inGameBarsDisplay->setVisible(true);
00196     m_ui->cameraBox->setDisabled(false);
00197     m_ui->windDirRtArrow->setDisabled(true);
00198     m_ui->windDirLtArrow->setDisabled(true);
00199     m_ui->windNumber->setDisabled(true);
00200     m_ui->windText->setDisabled(true);
00201 
00202     if(m_ui->m_levelSetDial->value() >= 2)
00203     {
00204         m_settingWind = startTimer(2);
00205         m_ui->windDirRtArrow->setDisabled(false);
00206         m_ui->windDirLtArrow->setDisabled(false);
00207         m_ui->windNumber->setDisabled(false);
00208         m_ui->windText->setDisabled(false);
00209         movieLeft->start();
00210         movieRight->start();
00211         movieLeft->setPaused(true);
00212         movieRight->setPaused(true);
00213     }
00214 
00215     m_updateScore = startTimer(5);
00216 }

00234 
00235 void GameControls::setPowerBar(float _inputPower)
00236 {
00237     static float _accumulatedPower = 0; // staitic as one time initialization fo power enough, its not aproperty of controls, so cant be its member
00238     if(_inputPower != 0)
00239     {
00240         _accumulatedPower = _accumulatedPower + _inputPower;
00241 
00242 
00243         if(_accumulatedPower >= 40)
00244         {
00245             _accumulatedPower = 40;
00246         }
00247 
00248         else if (_accumulatedPower <= 0)
00249         {
00250             _accumulatedPower = 0;
00251         }
00252      }
00253 
00254     else if (_inputPower == 0) // for down arrow to reduce power
00255     {
00256         _accumulatedPower = 0;
00257     }
00258 
00259     if (_accumulatedPower <= 20)
00260     {
00261        m_ui->powerBar->setStyleSheet(ColorHigh);
00262     }
00263     else if (_accumulatedPower > 20 && _accumulatedPower <= 30)
00264     {
00265        m_ui->powerBar->setStyleSheet(ColorIntermediate);
00266     }
00267     else if (_accumulatedPower > 30)
00268     {
00269         m_ui->powerBar->setStyleSheet(ColorLow);
00270     }
00271 
00272     m_ui->powerBar->setValue(_accumulatedPower);
00273 }

00276 void GameControls::setProgressBar()
00277 {
00278 
00279     if ( m_gl && m_gl->getGameStartedFlag() == 1)
00280     {
00281         m_ui->m_progressBar->setValue(m_ui->m_progressBar->maximum());
00282         m_ui->m_progressBar->setVisible(false);
00283         m_ui->loading->setVisible(false);
00284         killTimer(m_gameRunning);
00285 
00286     }
00287     else
00288     {
00289         m_ui->m_progressBar->setValue(10);
00290     }
00291 
00292 }
00293 
00294 void GameControls::timerEvent(QTimerEvent *_event)
00295 {
00296     if (_event->timerId() == m_gameRunning)
00297     {
00298         setProgressBar();
00299     }
00300 
00301     if (_event->timerId() == m_settingWind)
00302     {
00303         setRandomValueForWindLevel3();
00304     }
00305 
00306     if (_event->timerId() == m_updateScore)
00307     {
00308         // only if the game has not been won, should we update the score..so this might save us some function calls after the player has collided with the goal
00309         if (m_gl->getGameWonFlag() == true)
00310         {
00311             // display Text on the window
00312             m_ui->inGameBarsDisplay->setVisible(false);
00313             killTimer(m_updateScore);
00314         }
00315 
00316         else
00317         {
00318             float tempScore = getCurrentScore();
00319 
00320             if (tempScore <= 50 && tempScore > 25)
00321             {
00322                 m_ui->grenadePower->setStyleSheet(ColorIntermediate);
00323             }
00324             else if (tempScore <= 25)
00325             {
00326                 m_ui->grenadePower->setStyleSheet(ColorLow);
00327             }
00328             m_ui->grenadePower->setValue(tempScore);
00329 
00330        // also check if its 0, if so, the player has lost and this has to be informed and the timer killed
00331            if ( tempScore == 0)
00332            {
00333                 m_gl->setGameLostFlag();
00334                 m_ui->inGameBarsDisplay->setVisible(false);
00335                 killTimer(m_updateScore);
00336            }
00337        }
00338    }
00339 }
00340 
00341 void GameControls::resetGame()
00342 {
00343     if(m_gl)
00344     {
00345         m_ui->s_GameWindowLayout->removeWidget(m_gl);
00346         m_gl->~GameLogic();
00347         killTimer(m_gameRunning);
00348         killTimer(m_settingWind);
00349         killTimer(m_updateScore);
00350         m_gl = 0;
00351     }
00352 
00353 
00354     m_ui->m_startGame->setDisabled(false);
00355     m_ui->levelSettingsBox->setDisabled(false);
00356     m_ui->textBrowser->clearFocus();
00357     m_ui->inGameBarsDisplay->setVisible(false);
00358     m_ui->cameraBox->setDisabled(true);
00359 
00360 }

00364 //if so, provide a random number and set
00366 //and it will set its wind factor value attribute which wil be got
00368 void GameControls::setRandomValueForWindLevel3()
00369 {
00370     static int seedValue = 10; // again common value, cannot be a member of this class
00371     static int valueGenerated = 0;
00372     int windValue = 0;
00373 
00374     if(m_gl)
00375     {
00376 
00377         if((m_gl->getSimulationFlag() == 0) && (valueGenerated == 0))
00378         {
00379 
00380             ngl::Random *randObj = ngl::Random::instance();
00381 
00382             windValue = (int)randObj->randomNumber(seedValue);
00383             m_gl->setWindValue(windValue);
00384 
00385             if (windValue > 0)
00386             {
00387                 // set the label value to display wind
00388                 m_ui->windNumber->display(windValue);
00389                 movieRight->setPaused(true);
00390                 movieLeft->setPaused(false);
00391             }
00392             else
00393             {
00394                 m_ui->windNumber->display(windValue);
00395                 movieLeft->setPaused(true);
00396                 movieRight->setPaused(false);
00397 
00398             }
00399 
00400             valueGenerated = 1;
00401 
00402 
00403          }
00404         else if (m_gl->getSimulationFlag() == 1)
00405         {
00406             valueGenerated = 0;
00407 
00408         }
00409    }
00410 }

00438 void GameControls::setCameraFromUI()
00439 {
00440     if (QObject::sender() == m_ui->leftCamera)
00441     {
00442 
00443         m_gl->changeCamera(CAM_LEFT);
00444     }
00445     else if (QObject::sender() == m_ui->topCamera)
00446     {
00447          m_gl->changeCamera(CAM_TOP);
00448 
00449     }
00450     else if (QObject::sender() == m_ui->rightCamera)
00451     {
00452          m_gl->changeCamera(CAM_RIGHT);
00453 
00454     }
00455     else if (QObject::sender() == m_ui->defaultBackCamera)
00456     {
00457          m_gl->changeCamera(CAM_DEFAULT);
00458 
00459     }
00460 }
